headline: CHAMP Titles Raises $55 Million In Largest Funding Round To Date
summary: CLEVELAND, December 30, 2025--CHAMP Titles, Inc. ("CHAMP"), the nation’s leading provider of digital solutions to motor vehicle agencies, announced today that it has raised $55 million in new financing, surpassing all previous rounds and marking the company’s largest raise to date. The round was led by W. R. Berkley Corporation, Point72 Ventures, and ORIX Corporation USA, with participation from other existing investors as well. CHAMP’s total funding now exceeds $100 million, reflecting strong a

headline: The Biggest IPO of the Year Prompts Huge Insider Buy
summary: Kodiak Sciences, Medline, and W.R. Berkley have seen some huge insider purchases, and there were some other notable insider purchases as well..
